mapper.select: SELECT PROD_ID, PROD_NAME, PROD_CNT, to_char((PROD_PRICE * PROD_CNT),'FM999,999,999') as PROD_ALL, to_char(PROD_WEARING_PRICE ,'FM999,999,999') as PROD_WEARING_PRICE, to_char(PROD_PRICE,'FM999,999,999') as PROD_PRICE, to_char((PROD_PRICE - PROD_WEARING_PRICE) ,'FM999,999,999')as PROD_MARGIN , COMPANY_ID FROM PRODUCT
